cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is an decent 2008 Honda Accord with only 91000 miles on it. Only been in one accident. Some hail damage.
This is an horribly trashed Honda Fit with only 56000 miles on it. Cloth seats. Smells like cats.
This is an pristine 2015 Dodge Charger with only 6000 miles on it. All the premium packages included.
